name: takeoff-ui
author: Turkish Technology Frontend Infrastructure Team < takeoffui@thy.com >

scripts.build: lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/core && lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/vue && lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/angular && lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/react && lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/tailwind
scripts.build:react: lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/core && lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/react
scripts.dev:vue: lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/core && lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/vue && lerna run dev --scope vue-app
scripts.dev:react: lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/core && lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/react && lerna run dev --scope react-app
scripts.dev:ng: lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/core && lerna run build --scope @takeoff-ui/angular && lerna run start --scope angular
scripts.format: prettier --write "**/*.{ts, tsx, js, jsx, d.ts, d.js, vue}" --cache
scripts.clean:core: rimraf packages/core/node_modules packages/core/dist packages/core/loader packages/core/.stencil packages/core/www
scripts.clean: npm run clean:core && npm run clean:vue && npm run clean:react && npm run clean:react && npm run clean:angular && npm run clean:react-app && npm run clean:vue-app && npm run clean:tailwind

*.{tsx,ts,js}: prettier --write "**/*.{ts, tsx, js, jsx, d.ts, d.js, vue}" --cache
